ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0101_0701_01_10:
Well, if it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Looks like I don’t have to ask if you’re ready
or not.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0101_0701_02_10: Don’t push yourself too hard, all right?
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0601_0701_02_10:
But Alola’s a really peaceful place.
Thanks to that, I get to take it easy.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0601_0701_03_10:
Even though there are plenty of things going
on around the world.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0601_0702_01_10: The police mascot for Alola is a Granbull.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0601_0702_02_10:
I personally think a Meowth wouldn’t be too
bad, either.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0602_0701_01_10:
Compared to other places, Alola has some
funny-looking Pokémon.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0602_0701_02_10:
Even my Persian looks different from the ones
you’re used to, doesn’t she?
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0602_0701_03_10: Alolan Persian have nice round faces.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0602_0702_01_10:
I know that Alolan Persian are
rare around these parts.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0602_0702_02_10:
I like both Alolan and normal versions, but I
personally prefer the fluffier Alolan ones.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0603_0701_01_10:
You know the Pokémon Honchkrow
and Krookodile?
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0603_0701_02_10:
They’ve got some scary looking mugs, but
you wouldn’t think so if you saw them smile.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0603_0701_03_10:
You can never know anything about a person or
a Pokémon just from a glance. When you have
a chance, take a good look at those around you.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0603_0702_02_10: You won’t get anything out of gazing at me.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0604_0701_01_10:
Pasio is nice and all, but I’m not really used to
being far from home.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0604_0701_02_10:
What sights to see, what food to eat...
I have no idea what to do.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0604_0701_03_10: In the end, I slack off just like I do in Alola.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0604_0702_01_10:
Things never changing is definitely a source
of comfort...even if it does get boring.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0605_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
No, it’s nothing too important.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0605_0701_02_10:
I noticed that Pasio doesn’t have a
Sushi High Roller around.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0605_0701_03_10:
I wanted their Z-Kaiseki Ronin Set,
but I guess there’s nothing I can do.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0605_0701_04_10:
If you ever find yourself in Alola,
I’ll treat you to it.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0605_0702_01_10: I heard that Kalos has a Sushi High Roller.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0605_0702_02_10:
But apparently they’re a little different from the
one in Alola.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/1701_0701_01_10:
Hold out your hand.
Here, you can have this.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/1701_0701_02_10: Whether it’s of use or not is up to you, though.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/1701_0702_01_10:
No point in a guy like me hanging on to
something like that.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/1701_0702_02_10:
But you’re different. If I find any again,
I’ll make sure to give them to you.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2501_0701_02_10:
If you need anything, let me know.
I can at least hear you out.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2501_0701_03_10: You look like you have a lot on your plate.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2501_0701_04_10:
You might even have stuff that you can’t do
all by yourself.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2501_0702_01_10:
You’ll tire yourself out if you’re always in
a rush.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2501_0702_02_10:
Taking it easy isn’t as bad a thing as people
might tell you.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2511_0701_01_10:
You’re getting really strong...
What are you planning for the future?
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2511_0701_02_10:
Trying to get even stronger is fine, too...
But that’s a really long path.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2511_0701_03_10:
But seeing how steadfast you are... It makes
me think you just might be able to make it.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2511_0702_01_10:
I’m an old man.
I try not to have dreams anymore.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2511_0702_02_10:
As long as young kids like you enjoy yourselves,
that’s all I can ask for.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/3001_0701_01_10:
Out for Pokémon battles this early, huh?
Me? I’m just loafing around, I guess.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/3002_0701_01_10:
You’re out and about pretty early. If you’ve got
something to do, better go get it sorted.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/3003_0701_01_10:
Hmm, already midday. You can train as hard as
you like, but don’t overdo it.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/3004_0701_01_10:
Hey there. If you’re up for Pokémon battles,
do them while it’s still light out.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/3005_0701_01_10:
Careful now. The paths around here can be hard
to see at night. I guess you’ll be fine with your
Pokémon, though.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi/3006_0701_01_10:
It’s already pretty late.
Once you’re done with whatever you’re doing,
you should head home and get some sleep.
